name: ID & Class Attributes
desc: We'll be looking at some more styling with CSS and introducing the ID and Class attributes.
takeaways: Introduce various styles for text including: font-size, color, background-color, font-style, and font-weight
Learn how selectors select ALL elements that match the selector

sections.head: What Will We Be Doing in This Lesson?
text: We'll be looking at some more styling with CSS by using the ID and Class attributes.
